title: 1989 - Bloodfight - Enter if you dare - The Ultimate Martial Arts Clash!

sources.description:
A fallen champion (Simon Yam) storms back into the underground tournament circuit with fists of fury! Two years after tragedy struck his prot√©g√©, he faces legendary fighters and personal demons in a no-holds-barred quest for redemption. Expect jaw-dropping choreography, intense rivalries, and a historic collision of Hong Kong and Japanese action styles!
